entry.title: Application Of Machine Learning in Artificial Intelligence

link.title: Application Of Machine Learning in Artificial Intelligence

entry.summary: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning are the two most trending topics nowadays among computer enthusiasts. These two terms are correlated to each other a lot, even some people use these two interchangeably. Artificial Intelligence is the concept of making machines, computer systems smart which simulates the human brain’s behavior by injecting its thinking ability, decision-making capabi...
